text:
Mike Hicks (August 1937 – 7 September 2017) was a British former politician, former executive member of printers’ union SOGAT, and former General Secretary of the Communist Party of Britain from 1988 through 1998. He was also a members of the Labour Party. He was born in Wapping, London, England.
Hicks died on 7 September 2017 in Bournemouth, Dorset, England of a heart attack at the age of 80.
